metadata.name: Social Media Creative Design
metadata.description: Design social media campaign assets across platforms

task.instructions: # Social Media Creative Design Create platform-optimized social media creative assets. ## Platform Specifications **Instagram**: Feed (1:1), Stories (9:16), Reels (9:16), Carousel **Facebook**: Feed (1:1), Stories (9:16), Video (16:9, 1:1, 9:16) **LinkedIn**: Feed (1:1), Document posts, Carousel **Twitter/X**: Feed (16:9, 1:1), Headers **TikTok**: Vertical video (9:16) ## Design Principles - Mobile-first design (80% of social is mobile) - Eye-catching visuals (stop the scroll) - Clear messaging (readable without sound) - Brand consistency with platform adaptation - Strong CTA - Test multiple variations
